name: Cursor 4 the Web - DT | WINDOWS/APPLE
description:
This is Style is created by Dave Tucker.
The cursor is designed for Windows/Apple and looks like a middle finger.

The cursor has seen all pages!

user.name: Dave Tucker
user.about:
Hi I'm Dave Tucker,
and I like it to create some styles for some Websites.

View my newest Style, the style 149854 or style 159235 and the newest version of style 131618.

If you want a crazy style, view this one: style 132863.

additional_info:
v1.0 (BETA) - the corresponding cursor has changed
v1.1 - small improvement
v2.0 - the cursor works on more pages
v2.1 - the cursor is now contant
v3.0 - the cursor works on all pages
